about_the_game:
◆◇◆ Introduction ◆◇◆

Two completely original pieces of music from the eternal and changeless ADV “Living in Spring” are available as a soundtrack.
  • “Snowflake”: Main Theme Music, a detailed portrayal of Cruel Spring.
  • “Spring Is Here”: Ending Theme Music, closing the end of the Spring as it is.

The music is composed by “SHIN_ZIX”.
He has made a lot of light, driving music. So this is a calm challenge for him.

◆◇◆ Contents ◆◇◆

This DLC contains MP3 and WAV (higher quality) sound data.

◆◇◆ Attention ◆◇◆

The purchase of this DLC forms part of the license conditions in the secondary terms of use of "Living in Spring".
For more information, please refer to the information on the main unit.

short_description: “Eternity and changeless were with this music” - Of the music that colored the eternal and unchanging ADV “Living in Spring”, two original music, “Snowflake” and “Spring Is Here”, are sent out as soundtracks. The Spring will never return, and you're moving on...
